response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment in your future endeavors. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair and attractive proposition considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 900000}
